definition: chinquapin (Castanopsis fargesii and other spp.), genus of evergreen trees

sentences.english: The operation practice proves that the DDS desulfurizer is clearly better than the tannin extract.
sentences.chinese: 運行實踐證明，DDS脫硫效果明顯優於栲膠法。

sentences.english: In this paper, the authors studied systematically on preventive effect of mimosa tannin on hexavalent-chromium in leather.
sentences.chinese: 系統地研究了荊樹皮栲膠對皮革中六價鉻的預防作用。

sentences.english: The Eucalyptus bark can been used as the new raw material of tannin extract, its tannin extract is worth of promoting and using.
sentences.chinese: 桉樹皮可作爲新品種栲膠原料，其栲膠值得推廣應用。

sentences.english: The Eucalyptus bark can been used as the new raw material of tannin extract, its tannin extract is worth of promoting and using.
sentences.chinese: 桉樹皮可作爲新品種栲膠原料，其栲膠值得推廣應用。

sentences.english: The method of sulfomethylation modification of bayberry tannin extract was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了毛楊梅栲膠的磺甲基化改性方法。

sentences.english: Rapid determination of tannin content in the branches and leaves of Casuarina;
sentences.chinese: 用膠體滴定法測定了橡椀栲膠中的單寧含量。

sentences.english: As China abounds in the tannin extract, so it is of bright prospect to develop this process.
sentences.chinese: 我國盛產栲膠，開發此法的前景是光明的。
